## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

- [ ] My code follows the [Effective Dart](https://dart.dev/guides/language/effective-dart) style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors (`dart analyze`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `dart format` on my code
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have updated the version in `pubspec.yaml` (if applicable)
